HDG.QB.content: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism
HDG.QB.linkedContent: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism

HDG.QB.content: Heidegger ends w/ admission of future inadequacy of this letter he wrote to Jünger, but describes the way of its reflection via quote by Goethe [quote seems to suggest that those who read closely must admit the damaging influence of conventional phrases—is Being a venerable phrase?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Heidegger ends w/ admission of future inadequacy of this letter he wrote to Jünger, but describes the way of its reflection via quote by Goethe [quote seems to suggest that those who read closely must admit the damaging influence of conventional phrases—is Being a venerable phrase?]

HDG.FS.content: matter (Sache) itself is sole authority, in seminar we work in common, text is only a means (Mittel), not an end (Ziel) [cf. Derrida] > in genuine seminar, teacher learns the most, he must listen rightly (rechte Hören) to the text > nothing ever to be believed, must be experienced [secret (Geheimnis) of seminar, be able to read Hegel’s whole book]

HDG.FS.content: the 2 possibilities of end of physics: 1) open to entirely new relation to nature 2) after research concludes settle into thoughtless exploitation (gedankenlosen Ausbeutung) of the discovery (Entdeckung)

HDG.FS.content: computer language makes visible end of language/tradition: surge of information veils disappearance [oblivion of oblivion] of what has been > prospective planning (Vorausplanung): obstruction (Absperren) of future

HDG.FS.content: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)

HDG.MA.content: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish

HDG.LP.content: night makes the thinker speak other words, can transmute because it too changes > Day’s decline not an end, but makes ready the beginning of Stranger’s wandering > the site of Trakl’s poems: die Abgeschiedenheit (apartness)

HDG.LP.content: gold, truth, rightness > [death] earliness in which stranger has expired (verstorben), shelters the Wesensgerechte of the unborn > the end (Ende) not sequel (Folge) of beginning, its the end of decaying Geschlechtes, thus precedes (vorauf) beginning of unborn Geschlechtes: as earlier earliness, has already overtaken the end
HDG.LP.linkedContent: gold, truth, rightness > [death] earliness in which stranger has expired (verstorben), shelters the Wesensgerechte of the unborn > the end (Ende) not sequel (Folge) of beginning, its the end of decaying Geschlechtes, thus precedes (vorauf) beginning of unborn Geschlechtes: as earlier earliness, has already overtaken the end

HDG.EC.content: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being
HDG.EC.linkedContent: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being

HDG.OHF.content: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible

HDG.OHF.content: fundamental questionableness (Fraglichkeit) in Vorhabe, only as such could there be something like: “fixing” on an end (ein Ende “fest” machen), what is fixed on (or not) has being (Sein hat!) as a how of Dasein: how to relate this to death?
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: fundamental questionableness (Fraglichkeit) in Vorhabe, only as such could there be something like: “fixing” on an end (ein Ende “fest” machen), what is fixed on (or not) has being (Sein hat!) as a how of Dasein: how to relate this to death?

HDG.OHF.content: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)

HDG.OHF.content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]
